title: That the City Council minutes from the meeting of October 15, 2024 be approved.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-017, dated December 2, 2024 of the Commissioner of Legislative Services as follows: That Council pass a by-law in the form attached as Appendix A to Report LSCLK24-017 to amend various committee Terms of Reference.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-017, dated December 2, 2024 of the Commissioner of Legislative Services as follows: That Council pass a by-law in the form attached as Appendix A to Report LSCLK24-017 to amend various committee Terms of Reference. That the term for Louis O'Brien be extended for an additional three years on the COPHI Board, until 2027.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-017, dated December 2, 2024 of the Commissioner of Legislative Services as follows: That Council pass a by-law in the form attached as Appendix A to Report LSCLK24-017 to amend various committee Terms of Reference. That the term for Louis O'Brien be extended for an additional three years on the COPHI Board, until 2027. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-018, dated December 2, 2024, as amended, on behalf of City of Peterborough Holdings Inc as follows: That Ruth Uy and Tareq Zabet be appointed to the COPHI Board for a three-year term commencing January 1, 2025, and expiring December 31, 2027. That the term for Louis O'Brien be extended for an additional three years on the COPHI Board, until 2027.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-017, dated December 2, 2024 of the Commissioner of Legislative Services as follows: That Council pass a by-law in the form attached as Appendix A to Report LSCLK24-017 to amend various committee Terms of Reference. That the term for Louis O'Brien be extended for an additional three years on the COPHI Board, until 2027. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-018, dated December 2, 2024, as amended, on behalf of City of Peterborough Holdings Inc as follows: That Ruth Uy and Tareq Zabet be appointed to the COPHI Board for a three-year term commencing January 1, 2025, and expiring December 31, 2027. That the term for Louis O'Brien be extended for an additional three years on the COPHI Board, until 2027. That the ruling of the Chair be upheld.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-017, dated December 2, 2024 of the Commissioner of Legislative Services as follows: That Council pass a by-law in the form attached as Appendix A to Report LSCLK24-017 to amend various committee Terms of Reference. That the term for Louis O'Brien be extended for an additional three years on the COPHI Board, until 2027. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-018, dated December 2, 2024, as amended, on behalf of City of Peterborough Holdings Inc as follows: That Ruth Uy and Tareq Zabet be appointed to the COPHI Board for a three-year term commencing January 1, 2025, and expiring December 31, 2027. That the term for Louis O'Brien be extended for an additional three years on the COPHI Board, until 2027. That the ruling of the Chair be upheld. That Council approve the recommendation as follows: a) That Report IPGPL24-033 be received for information and, b) That pursuant to section 29(6) of the Ontario Heritage Act, Council consider an objection to its Notice of Intention to Designate 1400 Monaghan Road and that the City of Peterborough withdraws the notice to designate.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-017, dated December 2, 2024 of the Commissioner of Legislative Services as follows: That Council pass a by-law in the form attached as Appendix A to Report LSCLK24-017 to amend various committee Terms of Reference. That the term for Louis O'Brien be extended for an additional three years on the COPHI Board, until 2027. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-018, dated December 2, 2024, as amended, on behalf of City of Peterborough Holdings Inc as follows: That Ruth Uy and Tareq Zabet be appointed to the COPHI Board for a three-year term commencing January 1, 2025, and expiring December 31, 2027. That the term for Louis O'Brien be extended for an additional three years on the COPHI Board, until 2027. That the ruling of the Chair be upheld. That Council approve the recommendation as follows: a) That Report IPGPL24-033 be received for information and, b) That pursuant to section 29(6) of the Ontario Heritage Act, Council consider an objection to its Notice of Intention to Designate 1400 Monaghan Road and that the City of Peterborough withdraws the notice to designate. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report CAOPC24-004, dated December 9, 2024 of the Chief Administrative Officer as follows: That Council direct staff to proceed as recommended in Closed Session Report CAOPC24-004 dated December 9, 2024, of the Chief Administrative Officer respecting the collective bargaining process.

24-087 Being a By-law to authorize the 2025 portion of the Citywide Trail Rehabilitation project proceed at an estimated cost of $250,000 and the issuing of tax-supported debentures to a maximum of $250,000 to finance the work 24-088 Being a By-law to authorize the 2025 Community Services Property Upgrades at an estimated cost of $4,345,000 and the issuing of tax-supported debentures to a maximum of $4,146,000 to finance the work 24-089 Being a By-law to authorize the 2025 portion of the Curtis Creek Watershed Improvements project at an estimated cost of $940,000 and the issuing of tax-supported debentures to a maximum of $573,500 to finance the work 24-090 Being a By-law to authorize the 2025 portion of the Lansdowne St Rehabilitation-Park St to Otonabee River project proceed at an estimated cost of $2,000,000 and the issuing of tax-supported debentures to a maximum of $2,000,000 to finance the work 24-091 Being a By-law to authorize the 2025 portion of the Pavement Preservation project at an estimated cost of $5,500,000 and the issuing of tax-supported debentures to a maximum of $1,000,000 to finance the work 24-092 Being a By-law to authorize the 2025 portion of the Road Surface Repair Program at an estimated cost of $2,300,000 and the issuing of tax-supported debentures to a maximum of $500,000 to finance the work 24-093 Being a By-law to authorize the 2025 portion of the Television Road Bridge over South Meade Creek project at an estimated cost of $3,000,000 and the issuing of tax-supported debentures to a maximum of $3,000,000 to finance the work 24-094 Being a By-law to authorize the 2025 portion of the Trails and Cycling Network Upgrades Program at an estimated cost of $200,000 and the issuing of tax-supported debentures to a maximum of $200,000 to finance the work 24-095 Being a By-law to establish a pre-consultation protocol that applicants may follow prior to the submission of certain planning applications and to repeal By-law Number 23-032 24-096 Being a By-law to amend the Terms of Reference for Committees 24-097 Being a By-law to Designate Certain Properties in the City of Peterborough Under the Ontario Heritage Act, R.S.O. 1990, c. O.18 (469 Weller Street)
That by-law 24-098 be approved. 24-098 Being a By-law to confirm the proceedings of the Council at its meeting held on December 9, 2024
That this meeting be adjourned at 9:01 p.m.
